nodes.text: The Alderaanian Graveyard, known as the Graveyard of Alderaan to smugglers, was an asteroid field in the Alderaan system created by the destruction of Alderaan. Under the Galactic Empire, the graveyard was held under a blockade until the Empire's defeat at the Battle of Endor. After the battle the Alderaan Flotilla accessed the graveyard, looking for relics of Alderaan in the asteroids.
